net.proteusframework.ui.search

Interface JoinConditionHelper<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - return type for helper methods.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JoinedQLBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHQLBuilder.HQLJoinBuilder, JoinedQLBuilderImpl, LateralJoinQLBuilder, QLJoin

    public interface JoinConditionHelper<T>
    Helper API for creating join conditions.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@proteus.co)
